languages.text: "Хватит, Йегер. Твои усилия по сохранению десятины не просто не работают — они вредят. Так что сложи оружие, пока не совершила последнюю ошибку".
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
languages.original_text: "Хватит, Йегер. Твои усилия по сохранению десятины не просто не работают — они вредят. Так что сложи оружие, пока не совершила последнюю ошибку".

traits.locale_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts to protect the tithe not helping, they are actually hurting the cause. So lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts to protect the tithe not helping, they are actually hurting the cause. So lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts to protect the tithe not helping, they are actually hurting the cause. So, lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts to protect the tithe not helping, they are actually hurting the cause. So, lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."
"Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

languages.text: «Basta, Yeager. Sus esfuerzos no solo no sirven para proteger el diezmo, sino que dañan directamente a la causa. Suelte las armas antes de cometer un error irremediable».
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: «Basta, Yeager. Sus esfuerzos no solo no sirven para proteger el diezmo, sino que dañan directamente a la causa. Suelte las armas antes de cometer un error irremediable».

languages.text: “够了，耶格尔。你的所作所为不仅无益于守护什一税，反而还对这个目标构成了威胁。立刻放下武器，否则，这就会是你犯下的最后一个错误。”
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: “够了，耶格尔。你的所作所为不仅无益于守护什一税，反而还对这个目标构成了威胁。立刻放下武器，否则，这就会是你犯下的最后一个错误。”

languages.text: 「十分だ、イェーガー。お前の取組みが租税を守る上で役立たなかっただけでなく、実際に原則を毀損している。最後の過ちを犯す前に武器を下ろせ」
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: 「十分だ、イェーガー。お前の取組みが租税を守る上で役立たなかっただけでなく、実際に原則を毀損している。最後の過ちを犯す前に武器を下ろせ」

languages.text: « Assez, Yeager. Non seulement vous ne faites rien pour nous aider à protéger la dîme, mais vous compromettez notre mission sacrée. Abaissez vos armes avant de commettre une erreur qui vous serait fatale. »
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: « Assez, Yeager. Non seulement vous ne faites rien pour nous aider à protéger la dîme, mais vous compromettez notre mission sacrée. Abaissez vos armes avant de commettre une erreur qui vous serait fatale. »

languages.text: "Yeter Yeager! Çabaların, aşarı korumaya yardım etmediği gibi bilakis duruma zarar veriyor. Ölümcül bir hata yapmadan önce silahlarınızı bırakın."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Yeter Yeager! Çabaların, aşarı korumaya yardım etmediği gibi bilakis duruma zarar veriyor. Ölümcül bir hata yapmadan önce silahlarınızı bırakın."

languages.text: "Das reicht jetzt, Yeager. Eure Bemühungen helfen nicht, den Zehnt zu schützen, sondern schaden vielmehr der Sache. Also legt Eure Waffen nieder, bevor Ihr einen letzten Fehler macht."
languages.original_text: "Enough, Yeager. Not only are your efforts not helping to protect the tithe, they are actually hurting the cause. Lay down your weapons before you make one final mistake."

traits.locale_text: "Das reicht jetzt, Yeager. Eure Bemühungen helfen nicht, den Zehnt zu schützen, sondern schaden vielmehr der Sache. Also legt Eure Waffen nieder, bevor Ihr einen letzten Fehler macht."
